attributes.action: Stop the forced deportations to Iraq including Northern Iraq - KURDISTAN
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Forced deportations of Iraqi nationals are taking place. Iraq is not safe it is a war zone. I urge to stop these deportations, its is inhumane. Once Iraq is settled most of these people will return so allow them to live, work and settle in the UK for the forseeable future

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
